event.title: 1936) is a municipality of Finland, located

data.event: Salla (Kuolaj√§rvi until 1936) is a municipality of Finland, located in Lapland.
The municipality has a population of 3,758 (30 June 2015) and covers an area of 5,872.21 square kilometres (2,267.27 sq mi) of which 142.73 km2 (55.11 sq mi) is water.

event.title: invaded Finland at Salla during the Winter

data.event: Red Army troops invaded Finland at Salla during the Winter War but were stopped by the Finnish Army (see Battle of Salla).
